ProblemSection.title: The true cost of a car is more than the purchase price
ProblemSection.description: Many car buyers underestimate ongoing costs like insurance, maintenance, or depreciation. Our tool shows you which vehicle is really cheaper in the long run – based on realistic German data.

step3.title: AI Calculates Costs
step3.description: Our model analyzes data and calculates total costs.
